Professional Summary

Diligent IT Professional Manager with proven ability to manage and lead teams effectively. Successfully implemented process improvements that enhanced operational efficiency and team productivity. Demonstrated strong problem-solving and communication skills to drive team success.

Accomplishments

  • Managing 3 public cloud platforms including AWS, Azure and Ali-cloud.
  • Budget responsibility is over >150 million RMB per year.
  • Led the go-live of the new generation of BMW mobile apps successfully.
  • Supervised team of >100 staff members.
  • Collaborated with 30 DevOps teams cross regions during several regulatory risk management projects.
